articles.title: Apple tumbles, drags tech stocks lower as fears grow over China iPhone curbs - Reuters
articles.description: Apple fell nearly 4% on Thursday and sparked a selloff in tech stocks after reports that China has widened curbs on iPhone use by government staff in one of the U.S. company's biggest markets.
